channel.title: Moxibustion on Dao of Healing
channel.description: Recent content in Moxibustion on Dao of Healing

item.title: On Cancer & Tumor | The Painless Radiotherapy Method of Traditional Chinese Medicine
item.description: More and more people are getting cancer these years. Why? The reason is that once a tumor is identified, the treatment principles and methods are completely wrong. As a result, patients already going under a cancer treatment get new cancerous tumors while they are not fully recovered from the existing ones. The author of this article consulted many medical cases from ancient and modern times, and wrote this article based
item.dc:creator: Dao of Healing
